column5: APPF see my prior posts As I see it huge emerging niche market no viable competitor high brand loyalty rocketing stock value
APPF I own a law firm that uses mycase likely to be high brand loyalty in this industry bc its a nightmare to change CRMs in a law firm
APPF other Law Firm CRMs exist but few are cloudbased They also focus on small to midsize firms about 70 of the legal industry
APPF law firm CRM mycase has about 10000 firms using it Very small part of the possible market share No significant competitor
APPF I think the stock has a lot more growth in it Their mycase product is excellent and there is a lot of potential market share
